item.title: FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time digital pre-orders now available for PS5, PS4, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/fantasy-life-i-the-girl-who-steals-time-digital-pre-orders-now-available-for-ps5-ps4-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Switch pre-orders not yet available.

Digital pre-orders for social slow-life RPG FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time are now available for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 via PlayStation Store, Xbox Series via Microsoft Store, and PC via Steam, publisher LEVEL-5 and developer LEVEL-5 Osaka Office announced. Switch pre-orders have not yet opened, and LEVEL-5 has not announced an opening date.

FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time is available for pre-order in the following two editions:

  • Standard Edition ($59.99 / £49.99 / €59.99 / ¥7,678)
    • A copy of the game
    • Pre-Order Bonus: “Adventurer’s Pack” – This special bundle includes the Flutter Charm, an accessory that boosts your experience gains, plus nine types of useful consumable items to help you on your journey!
  • Digital Deluxe Edition ($69.99 / £57.99 / €69.99 / ¥8,778)
      • A copy of the game
      • Early / advance access beginning May 18
      • Exclusive Mount: Mini Napdragon
    • Exclusive Napdragon Weapons – Napdragon Sword, Napdragon Claymore, Napdragon Bow, Napdragon Staff
    • Iconic Outfit Pack
      • Yuelia – Ethereal Girl’s Dress, Ethereal Girl’s Sandals
      • Edward – Archaeologist’s Hat, Archaeologist’s Coat, Archaeologist’s Boots
      • Trip  Trip’s Helmet
    • Pre-Order Bonus: “Adventurer’s Pack” – This special bundle includes the Flutter Charm, an accessory that boosts your experience gains, plus nine types of useful consumable items to help you on your journey!

In Japan, physical editions will also be available for PlayStation 5 and Switch, which are available for pre-order via retailers such as Play-Asia.

FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on May 21. It will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, and Spanish language options. Read more about the game here.

item.title: ARK: Survival Ascended DLC expansion ‘ARK: Lost Colony’ announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/ark-survival-ascended-dlc-expansion-ark-lost-colony-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out in November. Featuring anime scenes by MAPPA and the voice talent of Michelle Yeoh.

Publisher Snail and developer Studio Wildcard have announced ARK: Survival Ascended‘s first major canonical expansion, “ARK: Lost Colony.” It will launch in November for $29.99. Pre-orders will open in June.

The expansion will feature “numerous cinema-grade” anime story sequences produced by Japanese animation studio MAPPA (known for Jujutsu Kaisen, Attack on Titan, Chainsaw Man), as well as the voice talents of Academy Award winner Michelle Yeoh (Everything Everywhere All At Once) reprising her ARK: The Animated Series role as Mei Yin, Madeleine Madden (Wheel of Time) as Helena Walker, Auli’i Cravalho (Moana) as Meeka, and other to-be-announced, fan-favorite characters voiced and depicted for the first time in-game.

Here is an overview of the content, via its Steam page:

Confront the demons of Arat Prime—birthplace of the ARKs—in ARK: Survival Ascended‘s first massive canonical expansion pack, ARK: Lost Colony! Starring Michelle Yeoh as Mei Yin in cinematic anime sequences by legendary Japanese studio MAPPA, the epic new story of ARK: Lost Colony bridges the gap from ARK: Extinction to ARK: Genesis and into the world of ARK II. As you follow in Mei Yin’s footsteps through an intense journey into the heart of darkness, you’ll unlock powerful “Lost” character ability trees, befriend exotic tames, craft “Cursed” tiers of gear, and master advanced new building systems!

But beware, the frozen wastes of Arat Prime are not devoid of intelligent life; on the contrary, the city has become a war-torn battleground between twisted Element-powered ‘factions’ seeking to undo what was accomplished at the end of ARK: Extinction. Together with generations of heroes, you’ll unite the past and the future of ARK!

ARK: Survival Ascended is available now in Early Access for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch the expansion announcement teaser trailer and an ARK series history trailer below.

Expansion “ARK: Lost Colony” Announce Teaser Trailer

10 Years of ARK Games

item.title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves second open beta test set for March 26 to 31
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/fatal-fury-city-of-the-wolves-second-open-beta-test-set-for-march-26-to-31

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

One more online test ahead of the game's launch.

SNK will host a second open beta test for Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves from March 26 at 10:00 p.m. PT / March 27 at 1:00 a.m. ET to March 31 at 1:00 a.m. PT / 4:00 a.m. ET, the company announced. It will be available across PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, and will not require a PlayStation Plus or Game Pass Core subscription.

Get the details below.

About the Second Open Beta Test

A second open beta test for Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves will soon be held in an effort to improve the online experience. Players will be able to choose from nine characters (including, for the first time, the mighty grappler Tizoc) as they tackle Training Mode and more throughout the test period.

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves features a unique art style that stimulates the senses, an innovative REV System that supercharges the excitement, and two distinct control schemes that will thrill newcomers and veterans alike. Get a taste of the action ahead of its April 24 release—no PlayStation Plus or Xbox Game Pass Core / Ultimate subscription required!

Test Details

  • Period:
    • Start: March 26 at 10:00 p.m. PT / March 27 at 1:00 a.m. ET
    • End: March 31 at 1:00 a.m. PT / 4:00 a.m. ET
  • Platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series, PC (Steam)
  • Playable Modes:
    • Online: Online Profile, Leaderboard, Ranked Match, Casual Match, Room Match
    • Offline: Training, Classic Versus, Tutorial
  • Playable Characters:
    • Hotaru Futaba
    • Jenet
    • Kain R. Heinlein
    • Mai Shiranui
    • Preecha
    • Rock Howard
    • Terry Bogard
    • Tizoc
    • Vox Reaper
  • Playable Stages:
    • Bar “Street Stars”
    • Training
    • Training Ground
    • Universal Arena

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on April 24.
